name: Courtyard Dodge 'Em
description: The concept is simple: you must escape the courtyard by finding a key, finding the locked gate, and going through it.  In the courtyard are enemies trying to get you.  You must dodge the enemies and obstacles in the courtyard while attempting to escape. The player and enemies have momentum, so you can dodge and juke to make your escape.  The first level has 3 enemies, and each subsequent level has an additional 3 enemies, up to level 15 (45 enemies).
